title: Psychedelic literature beginner's kit
description:
This is by no means a comprehensive collection, but is meant as an invitation to the vast literature on psychedelics and its culture and philosophies.

The collectino includes:

Fadiman.The psychedelic explorer_s guide
Grob, Walsh.eds.Higher_Wisdom (Grof, Hofmann, Shulgin et al).pdf
[Hagenbach.Mystic chemist the life of Albert Hofmann]
[Hayes.Tripping]
[Leary, Timothy]
   Leary.Flashbacks
   Leary.The delicious grace of moving one's hand (sex writings)
   Forte ed.Timothy Leary - outside looking in
[McKenna, Dennis.The Brotherhood of the Screaming Abyss]
[McKenna.Food of the Gods 1992]
Raetch ed.Gateway to Inner Space - Sacred Plants, Mysticism and Psychotherapy 
Shulgin.PIHKAL Book 1 & 2.djvu
[Strassman ed. Inner Paths to Outer Space]
[The Entheogen Review (best of)]
